ing: 1 pound fresh broccoli, cut into spears
1 1/2 cups cubed cooked chicken or turkey
1 (10.75 ounce) can Campbell'sÂ® Condensed Broccoli Cheese Soup or Campbell'sÂ® Condensed 98% Fat Free Broccoli Cheese Soup*
des: "This saucy classic pairs cooked chicken or turkey with broccoli in a cheesy sauce, which stirs together easily. Bake until piping hot and serve with hot biscuits or noodles."
ins:
Arrange broccoli and chicken in 9-inch pie plate or 2-quart shallow baking dish.
Mix soup and milk and pour over all.
Sprinkle with cheese.  Mix bread crumbs with butter and sprinkle on top.
Bake 400 degrees F for 25 minutes or until hot.
